assignments.description: Populates the SCOL_UAO_Temp collection variable with the utility accounts that are included in the Price data
assignments.name: Populate_SCOL_UAO_Temp
assignments.label: Populate SCOL UAO Temp

assignments.description: Sets the variables for utility accounts that were selected as excluded
assignments.name: Set_UAO_Status_to_Priced_Excluded
assignments.label: Set UAO Status to Priced - Excluded

decisions.description: Used to exit loop if no utility accounts were selected for exclusion
decisions.name: Check_for_Exclusions
decisions.label: Check for Exclusions

decisions.description: Checks the loop variable to see if it was selected as a utility account to be excluded
decisions.name: Check_Utility_Account_for_Exclusion
decisions.label: Check Utility Account for Exclusion

loops.description: This loop runs through all included utility accounts (in the price data) and updates the excluded utility accounts from screen 2.
loops.name: Loop_Utility_Accounts
loops.label: Loop Utility Accounts

fields.name: TXT_Screen_1
fields.fieldText:
Use this component to create a new Quote.


You can only use the most recent Price data to create a Quote.


Click 'Next' to start.

fields.name: TXT_screen_1b
fields.fieldText: There is no pricing data available for this opportunity. Please wait for pricing to upload price data before trying to create a quote.

fields.name: TXT_Screen_2
fields.fieldText:
The below list will only show Utility Accounts that were included in the Price file that you selected on the previous screen.


You can use the below list to exclude certain Utility Accounts from the Quote.

fields.name: TXT_Screen_3
fields.fieldText:
The 6 default terms will be added to the Quote automatically.


You can use the below list to select additional 'Sweet Spot' prices that you would like include in the Quote.


You do not need to any additional prices if you don't want to.

fields.name: TXT_Screen_4
fields.fieldText:
Use the below fields to update the sales margin and broker margin respectively.


The total Tax and POR adjustment factor for this Price is: {!FRM_Tax_POR_Factor}.

fields.name: TXT_Screen_4_2
fields.fieldText: Click 'Next' to see the estimated deal value based on the margin value you enter above. You can always click 'Previous' to change the margin before creating the Quote.

fields.name: TXT_Screen_5
fields.fieldText:
Based on a sales margin of {!VAR_Sales_Margin}, you are expected to make {!FRM_Annualised_Sales_Margin} of annualised margin on this opportunity.


Click 'Previous' if you wish to change either margin values.


Click 'Next' to generate your Quote.

fields.name: TXT_Screen_6
fields.fieldText:
Your Quote has been created.


Click Finish to Exit.
